topic.title: 【需要技术支持】A strange email address, any programmer know what is it?
topic.body:
最近，我一个（逼格比较高的）（信仰自由主义的）朋友给我推荐了一些资料，然后发给我一个“邮箱”地址。但是这个地址并不是常见的那种，而是“~Mb-QLI*******hrJrKgw~UidfiVzL*****oZDXKvrJps***s7s9ZSiX8AyT******1zBAF3tEZC****vs6gcH”（星号处为马赛克，原文是大小写字母及数字0至9）这种，被“~”和“-”分隔的hash字符串。不知道有没有大佬了解这是什么，我猜是网盘一类的东西，但是不能很确定，拜谢。

Recently, a friend recommend some file to me, and he told me an `email' address. But the address isn't the form like what I have seen before, like 'xxx@yyy.com'. His email address is just like '~Mb-QLI*******hrJrKgw~UidfiVzL*****oZDXKvrJps***s7s9ZSiX8AyT******1zBAF3tEZC****vs6gcH'(I hide some characters with asterisk), which look like some kind of hash code desperated by '~' and '-', because I have counted the characters behind the last '-', the number is just 64. I don't know which kind of `email' is it, maybe some kind of net disk? So, thanks to anyone have advice.

topic.title: 【求助】Anyone have trust .su3 I2p reseed file?
topic.body: Because of the GFW, I can't reseed directly from the URL. So I want to find some .su3 reseed file. Does anyone have trust one to download?

1_12zCc2NbwzhGnp9uMuoCT6EEKrEGmBmGiL.body:
> [testtesttest1](#comment_1_1MzbKchvvhdKxf8JRFL9vAVMqF7YQu9zuk): Judging by characters and address length, looks like I2P's I2P-Bote address. I2P-Bote is a secure distributed email-like system.You need to install I2P and I2P-Bote plugin to make it work.

I have seen the introduction of I2P-Bote and I think what I need. So thank you very much.

> [testtesttest1](#comment_1_1MzbKchvvhdKxf8JRFL9vAVMqF7YQu9zuk): Judging by characters and address length, looks like I2P's I2P-Bote address. I2P-Bote is a secure distributed email-like system.You need to install I2P and I2P-Bote plugin to make it work.

I have tried I2P, But Because of the GFW, I can't get any seed. So how can I reseed I2P? I want try to use tor as the HTTP proxy for I2P reseeding, but it seemed that something went wrong.

> [twdjb](#comment_2_1ANJcfP9A7t2T1BhzQa5CmpoPZmJgBgHmh): 可能是resilio链接，需要用resilio软件打开下载，恐怕不是邮箱，

嗯，已经问到了，是I2P的暗网邮箱

1_1CnZWrceWZN4hF4uNoKqWXNZgLgoqvWoKB.body: 感觉上要是能按报告说的来，还是非常值得期待的。

1_1K44HS8nVyK5zkxinpQ7YruQNoDLzxCqtd.body:
> [tuncn](#comment_3_1K44HS8nVyK5zkxinpQ7YruQNoDLzxCqtd): 在他长达3个半小时的报告中，习近平强调中国特色的社会主义已经进入了一个"新时代"。习近平为中国制定了宏图大略，他表示中国为接近世界舞台的中心做好了准备；并将能够从政治、经济、军事以及环境等各方面引领世界。

“世界上没有完全相同的政治制度模式，政治制度不能脱离特定社会政治条件和历史文化传统来抽象评判，不能定于一尊，不能生搬硬套外国政治制度模式。”

> [sibu](#comment_12_1FJCJm9PPaL2Lcfv64fSCuXXBHQcE4JdGY): 这不能成为他终身在台上的理由

终身可能性不大，不过多干两届把“一带一路”贯彻下去我觉得可以接受。

> [tuncn](#comment_6_1K44HS8nVyK5zkxinpQ7YruQNoDLzxCqtd): 估计会修改党章,实行主席制,去掉7上8下限制,再干个二十年,才会有所好转!要不然再做5年,也改变不了什么状况!

差不多，“一带一路”这种体量的工程，不是两届任期内能完成的，大概要15到20年才能形成整个民族的共识自发推进下去。

> [mark24](#comment_1_1M8FRGMPLV7MNfcFdRgGnF7tTb9nHKht3a): 路在脚下，伟大复兴的未来在前方

还是要有信心的，路都是人走出来的
